#The most frequent last name:
def family(name:str):  
    return name.split()[1]
df["family"]= df["name"].apply(family)
df["family"].value_counts()[:5]
source.2e47bc65:

df.groupby("name").sum()["kids"].sort_values(ascending=False).head()

df["local_code"].value_counts()[:4].reset_index()
